item.title: Yen rebound subdues Japan luxury splurge at Cartier-owner Richemont
item.description: The Swiss luxury group's Japan sales declined 15% year-on-year in the fiscal first-quarter, even as wider group sales rose.

item.title: What Pres. Trump's new tax law means for your wallet
item.description: President Trump signed a new federal budget into law on July 4th, making changes to how education will be funded, university endowment tax rules, stat...

item.title: Tax cuts for private jet buyers expected to lead to surge in sales
item.description: The tax benefit, which revives a provision of the 2017 tax cuts, only applies to business jets, not jets used for personal use.

item.title: 'Big beautiful bill' changes the tax code on charitable giving: Here's what to know
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank reports on the tax changes for charitable giving.

item.title: Changes to bonus depreciation: Here's what taxpayers need to know
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank reports on recent provisions to bonus depreciation.
